data.title: UD Melilla vs UD Alzira live score, H2H and lineups
data.meta_description: UD Melilla UD Alzira live score (and video online live stream) starts on 27 Feb 2022 at 11:00 UTC time at Estadio Alvarez Claro stadium, Melilla city, Spain in Segunda Federacion, Group V, Spain.
